sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: These options are responsible for creating different styles for hero seciton.

sub_fields.label: Height
sub_fields.name: height
sub_fields.instructions: Adjust the height of the Hero Section. Values ​​are applied to "vh". Height of the viewport.

sub_fields.label: Enable Outline
sub_fields.name: enable_outline
sub_fields.instructions: Enable this option to add an outline around the title and description of the slider.

sub_fields.label: Separator Line
sub_fields.name: enable_separator_line
sub_fields.instructions: Enable this option so that a dash in the primary colors is displayed below the section.

sub_fields.label: Dotted Line
sub_fields.name: enable_dotted_line
sub_fields.instructions: Enable this option so that a dotted line to be displayed below the section.

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: Enable the options for this slide.
